features: [Auto Focus and Auto Keystone Correction] The Agreago projector with WiFi and Bluetooth features auto focus and auto keystone correction systems, making it a truly user-friendly projector. A clear and rectangular image can be obtained without repeatedly manually adjusting the wheel. Very easy to operate and set up. You will fall in love with the auto focus projector as soon as you use it.

[1920*1080 Full HD and 400ANSI Lumens] The movie projector produces vibrant and sharp images due to its native 1080P resolution, 4K compatibility, and 400 ANSI lumens. The brightness, clarity, and color are much improved by German chips and Japanese digital imaging technology. There are almost no edge blurring and black spots on the projection. Your eyes are protected by the 6-layer high-refractive lens and diffuse reflection. Perfect for displaying photos, watching movies, and home decoration.

[Latest WiFi 6 and 5.2 Two-way Bluetooth] This WiFi projector has a faster and stable wireless connection than other 5G projectors thanks to its industry-leading WiFi 6 feature. For better sound at events or outdoor activities, 5.2 dual-channel Bluetooth makes it simple to connect the projector to a Bluetooth speaker. You can also connect your phone to the projector via Bluetooth. The projector serves as a Bluetooth speaker. One video projector lets you have a double bonus.

[Compatible with PowerPoint and Other Devices] Similar to teaching projectors, the home theater projector is able to read PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and Text files directly from USB flash drives. Can be used for charity education, small-group lessons, and conferences. The portable projector is compatible with well-known gadgets including iPhone/Android phones, laptops, tablets, TV sticks, USB drives, DVD players, external speakers, etc. via HDMI/USB/AV/Audio connectors.

[Louder Speakers and 300'' Large Screen Usage] Upgraded stereo sound cavity built-in. Without an additional speaker, you can enjoy a more dulcet and stronger sound, which is also the reason why the projector itself can be used as a Bluetooth speaker. The outdoor projector comes with a 100" folding screen that can be used anywhere you like, yard, garden, garage, RV, and camping. Other novel projections include workout videos, online lessons, painting, sewing, and Halloween/Christmas decorations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy a Cinematic Experience Wherever You Are

Previous page Next page 1 Outdoor Cinema 2 Home Theater 3 Eyes Protection 4 Other Features

Tips for Better Use Auto Focus and Auto Correction 1. Auto Focus's Default Setting: Once the projector is turned on or moved, it will automatically focus to make the image clear. You can turn off "Auto Focus” or "Auto Focus Once Powered On” in Projection Image Settings. 2. Auto Correction's Default Setting: The projector's auto keystone correction is defaulted to “Vertical Correction”. You can turn on “Horizontal Auto Correction" in Projection Image Settings. 3. Extra Function: In addition to auto focus, this video projector also supports electronic focus. When the image is not clear enough, you can press "F+" and "F-" on the remote to adjust the focus. 4. Extra Function: In addition to auto keystone correction, this mini projector also supports electronic keystone correction. When the image is not square enough, you can go to Projection Image Settings to perform 4P (4 Points) correction by using the remote. Packing List 1. Projector*1, Screen*1, Remote*1, HDMI Cable*1, AV Cable*1, Power Cord*1, Instant Friendly Se-rvice*24/7 2. The 100'' folding projection screen is packed in the box. Doesn't come with a screen stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Cool, Simple To Use Projector
reviews.reviewText: Just got this projector and I was easily able to connect it to my laptop with the HDMI cable (which was provided) to watch high quality videos on. The remote was pretty simple to use. It only needed 2 double A batteries (not included). Fortunately I had some batteries lying around my apartment. The image was clear, the sound was pretty good, it came with an aux cable, power cord, HDMI connector, and it even came with a big white screen that I could install in my apartment if I wanted to. Maybe I'll do that later lol.I also liked that it had the option to connect the projector via iOS, Android, amongst a variety of different ways. Unfortunately, I had trouble connecting it to my phones, but I read on the manual after that certain services like Amazon, and Netflix didn't prohibited screensharing with these devices. Fortunately, an HDMI cable (as I mentioned earlier) is a great work around this.I think it will be cool camping trips, and for random movie nights. Overall, this is a solid projector and I'm really happy with it. I hope this helps and thanks for reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Give it a couple of minutes.
reviews.reviewText: This projector has to "boot up" each time you turn it on. Then it adjusts focus and tilt, then it goes to the home screen. I wish it would just go to "HDMI" (The remote has a "home" button). It's a wonderful projector otherwise. Bright, clean and sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: This projector is amazing! Easy setup, great image quality, and all the features you can imagine. This really gives cinema vibes and the whole family loves it. Movie night for the kids, football for the husbands, everybody’s happy lol . The projector focuses automatically, no hassle. I was surprised by how clear and great the quality is. Get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The screen is so crisp and clear! The screen is really big and it can adjust itself to fit on your wall perfectly! I love to watch anime so this made it so much better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little projector, really decent focus options as well!
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: Nice little projector, really decent focus options as well! I’m actually pretty impressed with this projector and have used it to trace art murals, and other fun things. The auto focus is an awesome feature, and I love that this has a remote for all controls as well. My only single issue, is about the third time I used it, the lens would not go back into the unit or even change focus. I finally got it to work with a tiny nudge. But just keep that in mind, you may want to go more professional with you projector choice if this is something you are going to be using often! 🎞 🍿

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth the money!! The quality of the images are amazing and setting it up was fast and easy!! It’s perfect for a night with friends/family! Arrived very quickly and everything was in the box and nothing came damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can't play any movies
reviews.reviewText: I'm not able to play anything but YouTube on the projector worst thing is I did not open the box till after my return window so I can't even return the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 projectors, and at this price point, it's a nice little projector. Very simple set up, can use with Roku and works just like the TV. Speaker quality is mediocre, but we have it set up with a high quality speaker instead. Also great for parties and as a holiday projector. Happy with it for the price
